name: combora
short_description:
Combora is an open-source free CMS.

Combora is used by some hobbyists who want to edit their sites easy, but also wants full control of their site.

The CMS is written in PHP and uses MySQL as database. For making a connecting and executing query's PDO is used. For some speciale effects the CMS uses Javascript with the jquery libary. (e.g. the foto viewer).

You can use any design or even any template for your site. You only need to edit the index.php file and edit some template files. Without any knowledge about PHP or combora. If you have knwoledge about HTML, you can implent your template in no time.

The admin side is verry simple to use, but here you also have full control about the CMS. For example, you can add items to the menu, just by editing one single file that contains HTML.

Combora is still in development, to make use of the best technolegies, and make it very safe, therefore you can't download combora.

topic.fullpath: Topic :: Internet :: WWW/HTTP :: Dynamic Content :: CMS Systems
